translations.Capture high-quality screenshots of the: Capture high-quality screenshots of the current 3D view. Screenshots are saved as PNG images with the model name and timestamp.
translations.Reset camera to initial position and zoo: Reset camera to initial position and zoom level.
translations.Automatically adjust camera to fit the e: Automatically adjust camera to fit the entire model on screen.
translations.Automatically rotate the model continuou: Automatically rotate the model continuously. You can still zoom while rotating.
translations.Toggle between Perspective (realistic de: Toggle between Perspective (realistic depth) and Orthographic (parallel lines) camera modes.
translations.Quick camera positions: Front, Back, Lef: Quick camera positions: Front, Back, Left, Right, Top, Bottom, and Isometric views.
translations.Show or hide the ground grid. Helps visu: Show or hide the ground grid. Helps visualize model orientation and scale.
translations.Show or hide coordinate axes (Red=X, Gre: Show or hide coordinate axes (Red=X, Green=Y, Blue=Z).
translations.Toggle wireframe mode to see the model's: Toggle wireframe mode to see the model's edge structure.
translations.Change the scene background color using: Change the scene background color using the color picker.
Click on two points to measure distance. Switch units between mm, cm, m, inches, and feet. Labels always face the camera.
translations.Click on the model to add text notes. Ed: Click on the model to add text notes. Edit or delete annotations as needed. Text always faces the camera for easy reading.
translations.Compare two 3D models side-by-side. Sele: Compare two 3D models side-by-side. Select a second model to compare with the current one.
translations.Cycle through quality modes: Auto (detec: Cycle through quality modes: Auto (detects your device), Low, Balanced, High, Ultra. Affects rendering quality and frame rate.
translations.Choose theme: Auto (follows system), Lig: Choose theme: Auto (follows system), Light, or Dark mode.
translations.View detailed information: vertices, fac: View detailed information: vertices, faces, materials, textures, and dimensions.
translations.Export the current model as GLB (with te: Export the current model as GLB (with textures), STL (for 3D printing), or OBJ (universal format).
Clear cached textures and dependencies. Use if models aren't loading correctly.
translations.Capture the current view as an image fil: Capture the current view as an image file.
translations.Models load instantly! Textures appear p: Models load instantly! Textures appear progressively in the background.
translations.Textures in subdirectories (like \"Textu: Textures in subdirectories (like "Texture/" folder) are automatically found.
translations.Dependencies (MTL files, textures) are c: Dependencies (MTL files, textures) are cached for 7 days for faster reloads.
translations.Auto mode detects your device capabiliti: Auto mode detects your device capabilities for optimal performance.
translations.Use comparison mode to spot differences: Use comparison mode to spot differences between model versions.
translations.Click cube face to snap to view: Click cube face to snap to view
translations.Show or hide the 3D navigation controlle: Show or hide the 3D navigation controller from the top toolbar. The controller is draggable and can be positioned anywhere on screen.
translations.Click or drag on the circular ring to ro: Click or drag on the circular ring to rotate the model. Click farther from center for faster rotation.
translations.Click the panning mode button to switch: Click the panning mode button to switch from rotation to panning. Click or drag to move the camera horizontally or vertically.
translations.Use the + and - buttons on the controlle: Use the + and - buttons on the controller to zoom in or out. Hold to zoom continuously.
translations.In panning mode, click the reset button: In panning mode, click the reset button to return the camera to the centered position.
translations.Drag the controller by its edge to repos: Drag the controller by its edge to reposition it anywhere on the screen. Position is saved automatically.
translations.Click or drag to pan view: Click or drag to pan view
translations.Click or drag to rotate view: Click or drag to rotate view
translations.Click anywhere to pan - farther from cen: Click anywhere to pan - farther from center = faster
translations.Click anywhere to rotate - farther from: Click anywhere to rotate - farther from center = faster
translations.Comparison mode is currently unavailable: Comparison mode is currently unavailable due to a technical issue. Please try again later.
translations.Export your model as STL and open it dir: Export your model as STL and open it directly in your slicer application (if installed).
Choose where to save the file...
translations.File saved! Manually open it in {name}: File saved! Manually open it in {name}
translations.Opening in browser, please manually open: Opening in browser, please manually open in {name}
translations.Download complete! Open the file in {nam: Download complete! Open the file in {name}
translations.The model will be exported as an optimiz: The model will be exported as an optimized STL file for 3D printing
translations.URL scheme not supported, downloading in: URL scheme not supported, downloading instead...
translations.The app creates a temporary Nextcloud sh: The app creates a temporary Nextcloud share link that works with slicer applications. Link expires after 1 hour.
{name} is not installed on your system. Downloading the file instead...
